Armada



(Armada listens to the voice coming over her commlink.)


Armada:=
 Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is this?
=


(Armada says into the commlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with=
 fries)


  Airbomber: But where do we go?

  Arrow: That's up to you, Airb=
omber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

  Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to=
 you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

  Stranato: I didn't see it=
, but I believe it.

  Airbomber: But how can that be?

  Arrow: Call her.
=

  Airbomber: I tried that.

  Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of=
 things? I'll call her.

  Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

  Arrow: Is the=
re anyone named Infectra there?...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    F=
rom: Alloran2@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, =
March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
    Subject: Big Post(with fries)


    OOC: Please =
add the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
    Syria. 

=
    :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

    Ramjet: The one extremely=
 close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
    by a bot named Pre=
bon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maximals 
    and Alliance.=
  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a large faction 
    of Pred=
acons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
    b=
e able to work out an Alliance with them. 
    ~~~~~ 
    Wheeljack: I'd sa=
y a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
    ~~~~~ 
    =
Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, for they wil=
l 
    be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlik=
e 
    Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
    ::he walks out of his cave =
and starts flying to the CF:: 
    ~~~~~ 
    ::Time Warp was releived that=
 they were friends, until he heard what they 
    said about Infectra:: 
  =
  Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but s=
he 
    definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber=
, these 
    guys are fools.

the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
